name: Little Lines Puzzle
description:
Swipe with your finger to connect elements with colorful lines.
Make beautiful shapes and patterns in every Level.


How to Play
- Swipe to connect 2 Orbs of same color.
- Connect all the Orbs to win the level.
- Mark the stars to get special star points!
- Smile and celebrate the colorful moments with ""Little Lines""

Features
- Elegant & Minimalistic designed little Puzzle Game.
- Play anywhere! Low battery consumption!
- No Violence! The game is for everyone!
- 300+ unique levels! Designed to make you smarter!
- No WiFi required! Play everywhere Offline :)
- Use ""Hints"" to solve difficult levels. Or ask your friends for help :) Booth works!
- Game is super optimised and we keep your Data Protected and Safe.
